title: Judge rules Massachusetts offshore wind project halted by Trump administration can continue
description: A federal judge in Boston allowed the Vineyard Wind project to continue, halting the Trump administration's stop work order, citing economic losses.
content: A federal judge in Boston allowed the Vineyard Wind project to continue, halting the Trump administration's stop work order, citing economic losses.
